exw.description: The seller makes the goods available at their premises, or at another named place.

fca.description: The seller delivers the goods, cleared for export, at a named place.

cpt.description: The seller pays for the carriage of the goods up to the named place of destination

cip.description: The seller pays for the carriage of the goods up to the named place of destination and is required to obtain insurance for the goods while in transit.

dap.description: The seller delivers when the goods are placed at the disposal of the buyer on the arriving means of transport ready for unloading at the named place of destination.

dpu.description: The seller delivers the goods, unloaded, at the named place of destination.

ddp.description: Seller is responsible for delivering the goods to the named place in the country of the buyer, and pays all costs in bringing the goods to the destination including import duties and taxes.

fas.description: The seller delivers when the goods are placed alongside the buyer's vessel at the named port of shipment.

fob.description: The seller bears all costs and risks up to the point the goods are loaded on board the vessel.

cfr.description: The seller pays for the carriage of the goods up to the named port of destination.

cif.description: The seller pays for the carriage of the goods up to the named port of destination and is required to obtain insurance for the goods while in transit.
